queries.sheet: SELECT '${reportTitle}' as ReportTitle, '${CURRENT_TIMESTAMP}' as CurrentTime_UTC, '${NOW}' as CurrentTime_NOW, '${CURRENT_DATE}' as CurrentDate, '${CURRENT_TIME}' as CurrentTime, '${GETDATE}' as SQLServerFormat
SELECT '${KST_NOW}' as KST_Now, '${KST_DATE}' as KST_Date, '${KST_TIME}' as KST_Time, '${KST_DATETIME}' as KST_DateTime, '${KST_ISO_TIMESTAMP}' as KST_ISO_Format

SELECT '${KOREAN_DATE}' as KoreanDate, '${KOREAN_DATETIME}' as KoreanDateTime, '${KOREAN_DATE_SHORT}' as KoreanDateShort, '${WEEKDAY_KR}' as WeekdayKorean, '${MONTH_KR}' as MonthKorean, '${YEAR_KR}' as YearKorean

SELECT '${DATE_YYYYMMDD}' as YYYYMMDD_Format, '${DATE_YYYY_MM_DD}' as YYYY_MM_DD_Format, '${DATETIME_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS}' as DateTime_Combined, '${WEEKDAY_EN}' as WeekdayEnglish, '${UNIX_TIMESTAMP}' as UnixTimestamp, '${TIMESTAMP_MS}' as MillisecondTimestamp

SELECT '${department}' as Department, 'Report Creation Date: ${KOREAN_DATE}' as CreationInfo, 'Creation Time: ${KST_NOW}' as DetailedTime, 'Day of Week: ${WEEKDAY_KR}' as DayInfo, 'Filename Format: Report_${DATE_YYYYMMDD}_${department}' as FilenameExample, 'WHERE Condition Example: created_date >= ''${DATE_YYYY_MM_DD}''' as QueryExample
